Projects

Gradient Selector

The Background Gradient Selector project aimed to create an interactive tool that allowed users to customize the background gradient of a webpage in real-time.
Skills Learned:

  • DOM manipulation: Dynamically updating the background gradient based on user input.
  • Event handling: Capturing and responding to user interactions in real-time.
  • CSS gradients: Implementing linear gradients for a visually appealing background.
This project enhanced my proficiency in front-end development, deepened my understanding of user-centric design, and provided valuable insights into the intricacies of real-time web interactions.

See Live Source Code

Instagram Clone

Developed a functional Instagram clone using Vite.js for a performant front-end, Firebase for user authentication, database management, and back-end functionality, and Chakra UI for a clean and responsive user interface.
Skills Learned:

  • Full-Stack Development: Gained experience in both front-end (Vite.js, Chakra UI) and back-end development (Firebase) by building a complete web application.
  • User Authentication and Data Management: Implemented user signup/login functionality and utilized Firebase to handle user data storage and retrieval.
  • Front-End Framework Integration: Effectively integrated Chakra UI to create a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface for your Instagram clone.

See Live Source Code

Movie finder

Developed a user-friendly movie finder application using React.js, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Users can search for movies by title .
Skills Learned:

  • React Component Structure and State Management: Built reusable React components to organize your movie finder's user interface and effectively managed component state to handle user interactions (e.g., search input).
  • API Integration with React: Learned how to fetch movie data from an external API (like TMDB) using techniques like fetch or libraries like Axios, and integrated the retrieved data into your React components for display.
  • React UI Development: Practiced building user interfaces with React, including creating a search bar, displaying movie results, and presenting individual movie details in a visually appealing way.

See Live Source Code
